urls.title: The Handbook of Communication Science and Biology
urls.description: The Handbook of Communication Science and Biology charts the state of the art in the field, describing relevant areas of communication studies where a biological approach has been successfully applied. The book synthesizes theoretical and empirical development in this area thus far and proposes a roadmap for future research. As the biological approach to understanding communication has grown, one challenge has been the separate evolution of research focused on media use and effects and research

The study uses a #StrategicNarrative Analysis to understand the (A) System (B) Identity & (C) Issue narratives employed in the #IrelandUNSC campaign. 

3 key themes emerged: #Empathy, #Partnership, & #Independence.

#IrelandUNSC was a sub-effort of the larger #GlobalIreland campaign to grow & extend üáÆüá™'s image and influence abroad by 2025. 

#ICA21 #ICAPDIG https://t.co/FTBsZlzeJV

üáÆüá™ was elected to the #UNSC on a 2-year campaign budget far less than competitors üá®üá¶ ($850k) & üá≥üá¥ ($1.9 million) 

This study assumes @dfatirl & @irishmissionun's #StrategicNarratives were more effective than their counterparts.
